title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor
description:
Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating of checkboxes should use busy cursor

MA (01.10.2001 11:38:21)

1.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table, it takes a long time (around 30 seconds in my case).
EB:
The updating of the checked state of the table should be faster.
A busy cursor should be shown to indicate that the process is ongoing.

NOTES:
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open a workspace with many projects.
2. Select 'Export Zip' from the menu.
3. Select all projects.
4. Choose the desired file types.
5. Press ok.
